Uses of Class
com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.FlowLayout.Alignment

  • Packages that use FlowLayout.Alignment 
    Package Description
    com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout
    Provides classes which are used to visually arrange components in a UI.

    • Uses of FlowLayout.Alignment in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

      Fields in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout declared as FlowLayout.Alignment 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FlowLayout.Alignment FlowLayout.CENTER
      This value indicates that the components are placed in a row and centered relative to the containing WPanel.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment FlowLayout.LEFT
      This value indicates that the components are placed in a row and left-aligned relative to the containing WPanel.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment FlowLayout.RIGHT
      This value indicates that the components are placed in a row and right-aligned relative to the containing WPanel.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment FlowLayout.VERTICAL
      This value indicates that each component should be placed on a new row.
      Methods in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout that return FlowLayout.Alignment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlowLayout.Alignment FlowLayout.getAlignment() 
      static FlowLayout.Alignment FlowLayout.Alignment.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment[] FlowLayout.Alignment.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Constructors in com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout with parameters of type FlowLayout.Alignment 
      Constructor and Description
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment)
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment (no horizontal or vertical gap) and content alignment.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int gap)
      Deprecated. 
      use FlowLayout.FlowLayout(Alignment, Size)
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int gap, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Deprecated. 
      use FlowLayout.FlowLayout(Alignment, Size, ContentAlignment)
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int hgap, int vgap)
      Deprecated. 
      use FlowLayout.FlowLayout(Alignment, Size)
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int hgap, int vgap, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Deprecated. 
      use FlowLayout.FlowLayout(Alignment, Size, ContentAlignment)
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, Size space)
      Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, Size space, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Creates a FlowLayout with the indicated alignment and a gap between the components in the FlowLayout and alignment of content in the cells.
